author: Abe Bernikier
comment: Amazing concept. Seemed to work at first. But now I keep getting the message "unable to run sms". I set it to seems sms when I choose the action on my moto 360, but every time I select, I get an error message. Update - lowered my rating further, because it's completely disfunctional, and with all the attempts I made, there is no one to talk to.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content: Hi Abe! I'd love to help sort out the problem. If you'd email me at tockleapp AT gmail DOT com, I'd be glad to investigate this further. For reference, that email is the best way to reach us (I couldn't find any prior emails, sadly). Thanks! Thomas

title: Stopped working

comment: Simple, does the job, pleasing phone app interface. Well done dev! (One quick suggestion: consider an icon change? Almost passed this over as it looked like another watch face at first glance.)

author: Patrick Silva
comment: App does not have tasker permission
title: Cant do tasker

author: Paul Simpson
comment: Nice and simple to work out. Needs waaaaay more actions though for it to be of more use.
title: Good!

author: Casen
comment: I was looking all over google play for a android wear phone control app and this one is perfect!!!
title: AWESOME APP!!!

author: Denis Immoos
comment: Very Good :)

author: James Font
comment: Awesome app!
title: Great!

author: Amir Ayub
comment: Brilliant !

author: Rikter
comment: Almost perfect. If I could use tockle voice command without having to launch actionsets on my watch first I would give 5 stars. I tap my watch to launch the voice commands or say OK google but tockle voice commands are not accepted. If you could make this work I would even pay for this app. This would make tockle a valuable app.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Hey Rikter!
I'm not entirely sure what you're suggesting. Are you referencing the ability to run ActionSets with "Ok, Google"? Feel free to email your feedback in greater detail to tockleapp AT gmail DOT com!

-Thomas

title: Almost

author: Michael Kennedy
comment: I was working on making it work with my Tasker profiles and it stopped working. I clicked around trying to see what was wrong and suddenly had ~15 actions sent to it.  So something caused a lag.  If the profiles lag too far behind they should time out and not run later.
title: Works OK, but kinda flakey

author: mehdi bennajma
comment: Nice

author: Michael Walters
comment: The android wear equivalent of pebble Tasker! I wish it was quicker to access the commands but I have a hunch that is more of an Android wear issue then anything else...
title: Pebble Tasker for Android Wear

author: Andreas Constantinou
comment: It doesnt even start up

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content: Hey Andreas! We've pushed out some updates to address bugs with Samsung devices. If you're still having issues, please email us at tockleapp AT gmail DOT com! -Thomas

title: Doesnt work

author: Fam Jackson
comment: Can't get ok google to work, but that's ok, autovoice works well for that. What I need is the ability to reorder the action set list to my preference. Also, when I tap action sets in the watch's start menu, I would like to have the list show instead of the voice prompt. Maybe that can be a setting.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback! Reordering of ActionSets is already on the roadmap for the next major update and we'll look into making the list of all ActionSets more accessible.

-Thomas

title: Good start

author: Damon Devitt
comment: I set this up with a script to start and lock my car. Only suggestions I have is changing "Action Set" to something shorter, or if possible allowing us to make a custom name, and allowing us to change the delay after saying a command. I'd love to be able to say "open car controls". If you were to create a donation version I would gladly purchase it
title: Works great

author: Joseph Ostrander
comment: Was looking for something to control my Tasker tasks for the moto 360, and I came across this.  I'm giving it 4 stars because it actually does what I needed it to.  The one issue I had was with the voice control to do action sets.  It wouldn't work if the name of the set had a capital letter in it.  Google was hearing the words in lower case.  So I just made all the action sets names lowercase and then it worked.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Hey Joe! I just tried running tasks with both capitalization and no capitalization on my Moto 360 and wasn't able to reproduce the issue. Perhaps email us at tockleapp@gmail.com so we can look into it further? Thanks for the feedback!
- Thomas

title: Does my Tasker tasks

author: Derek Wyman
comment: Works great to access my Tasker tasks from my watch. Only request (as mentioned previously in comments) is to be able to access the task list directly and not have the voice prompt come up first.
title: Brilliant

author: Jim Wise
comment: Please give ability to open a profile while a call is active.

author: E Ghazali
comment: I have loved tasker for a long time, but wear compatibility was pretty DIY. Tockle is not just a bridge for android wear, but could potentially replace tasker if your needs aren't too complicated. Even then, as Tockle gets better it may provide enough functionality to supplant tasker altogether. Thank you dev!
title: A must have wear app

author: Jordan Palmer
comment: Can't even begin to describe how awesome this is. I'm not running anything advanced, but I accomplished what I wanted quickly and painlessly. Easier to understand than Tasker (which I'm still working on learning). So, dev, any plans for a donate version?

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback Jordan! We'll be announcing something in that regard soon!

Thomas

title: Excellent

author: Ben Udkow
comment: Dev was very responsive and fixed crashes.  Now I need to play around with it and get it all configured.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Hey Ben!
We've pushed out an update (1.0.1) which addresses the most common crashes. If the issue still persists, please contact us at tockleapp [at] gmail [dot] com.

-Thomas

title: Nice

author: Michael Johnson
comment: And I'm not even biased.  But for real, unlike one of the other 5 star reviews...
title: Serious hotness. Like hotter than Miley Cyrus hot...

author: Eric Strianese
comment: The voice options and clean selection options for executing Tasker tasks by touch makes this app a 5 star app. Love it.

author: Liam Fruzyna
comment: This feels much more simple than tasker. It makes it much easier to use but limits functionality. However it is awesome to use with wear.
title: Very nice but limited

author: Max Kirkby
comment: I highly recommend!
title: Excellent!!!

author: Cody Diehl
comment: So nice this is a fantastic wear application!
title: Wow

author: theo miller
comment: Keeps denying app permission, even after option is checked in tasker. Not sure if tasker or tockle issue..

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content: Hey Theo! Sometimes the order in which Tasker and Tockle are installed will affect Tasker plugins. Make sure to install Tasker is installed before Tockle. If you're still having issues, feel free to email us at tockleapp AT gmail DOT com! - Thomas

title: Something ain't right..

author: Jordan Vaandering
comment: A bit limited only being able to add 2 actions to a profile. Also it needs a feature to set a profile based on a Tasker variable or a task in Tasker's plugin page, since the profile options are a bit limited.

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content: Hi Jordan! Thanks for the feedback! We hope to address some of these issues in future releases. - Thomas

title: Good Start

author: Archit jain
comment: Good app but so many errors

reply.author: Thomas Gaubert
reply.content:
Hey Archit!
We've pushed out an update (1.0.1) which addresses the most common crashes. If you're still experiencing issues, please contact us at tockleapp [at] gmail [dot] com. -Thomas

author: Ali Mihandoost
comment: Nice & useful idea
